summary: Anshir is an aspiring young argonian adventurer you can have as a follower. He is marriageable, cannot be killed, and will not judge you if you steal, murder, and do all sorts of criminal deeds.
descriptionHtml:
Anshir (pronounced An-sheer) specializes in light armor, archery, one-handed, and restoration. He is quite sneaky as well; he doesn't trigger pressure plates and he has a few helpful sneak perks such as silent roll. He won't judge you for your crimes and he'll even gladly help you perform them. He levels with your character.

Anshir is marriageable and cannot be killed. He doesn't have the default argonian voice, he has the MaleEvenToned voice instead because I wanted him to seem younger than most of his argonian brethren. His default clothing is his hunter armor, but you can give him whatever armor you want and he'll equip it.

Anshir can be found near the sawmill in Falkreath.

Anshir's Inventory:
-Glass bow
-500 Glass arrows
-2 Glass swords
-1 Enchanted glass dagger
-3 Restore health potions
-2 Bottles of skooma
-1 Potion of cure disease
-1 Potion of invisibility
-Some randomly generated loot such as gems and rings
-Miscellaneous food items

PLEASE endorse if you like him! It lets me know the mod is working properly! I have tested him and he seems to work perfectly for me, however this is my very first mod so let me know if something is wrong with him and I'll do my best to fix the problem.

*** I have the Argonian Raptor Feet mod by J Hamilton (artifex0) installed, which shows in the images. I did not make that mod I only use it. I highly recommend it! ***
author: WarriorBreton
